title: Have a healthy baby
brief_description: Using animation, the film details the important stages of growth of the human embryo from conception to birth. There is major emphasis on the precise development of organ systems during the first three months. Ways that development may be disturbed, and the role played by good nutrition and health habits are also stressed.
